TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit RecordingCanvas extends Android.Graphics.Canvas

Docs.summary: A Canvas implementation that records view system drawing operations for deferred rendering.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created andÂ shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
